entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
